display.title: Ancient Armor (Gladiator)
display.description: Drop a stack of Corrupted Metal Scrap, Pig Hide & Iron Golem Core onto a Reinforced Deepslate Block, along with an already Timmed piece of Armor to convert it to a new Ancient Trim [Required: 64x Corrupted Metal Scrap 1x Pig Hide 1x Iron Golem Core 1x Any Trimmed Armor Piece | Drop Craft With: Reinforced Deepslate]
